name: Barter Empire A Massive Open World RPG
blurb: Classic RPG gameplay with a massive open world! Build your empire by buying land deeds, farming, questing, and much more!

rewards.reward: No Reward
[SPECIAL THANKS] Just for helping out, we will send you a special thank you message on kickstarter. Every little bit helps.
[FACEBOOK & WEBSITE SHOUT-OUT] As a thank you for helping the project, you will get a shout-out on our Facebook page and website with a link to your kickstarter profile.
[GAME ON] Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[POST GAME ON] (This is the reward for after the early bird special sells out.) Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[BE IN THE GAME] Be an NPC in the game! That's right, we will name the NPC off of you, any name (within reason) you want your NPC to have! Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

NEW! [WANTED DEAD OR ALIVE] Reward for your capture is a likeness of you in a pencil sketch on a wanted poster, found at Inn's, Mayor houses and the Post Office. You send us a picture of you, and we turn it into a sketch. Your name and a gold reward that you decide will be on the poster. Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

NEW! [JUNK MAIL] In Barter Empire, there are Post Offices. In the Post Office you get letters. Sometimes it will be a new quest, other times it is just junk mail. With this reward you will be able to write your own junk mail. "Come on down to Joe's used horse emporium, we got makes and models from all over Ditherra, including the new energy efficient horse." A great reward for the satirical types. Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

NEW! [GRAVE DIGGER] Here lies... YOU! Your name, and a brief sentence you write (within reason i.e. nothing offensive) will be inscribed onto a headstone in one of the graveyards in the game. You can have a tragic end, a funny farewell, a blessing from the gods, something scary, or something offbeat. The choice is yours! Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[SHOPKEEPER] You get to be a shopkeeper at one of the many shops in the game. Pick the name for your shopkeeper. Any name you want (within reason) it can be your kickstarter handle, your real name, or just any name at all.

Choose from either a weapons and armor merchant, an items merchant, a barter merchant or a specialty merchant (merchants who sell items such as blueprints for crafting or plants for alchemy would be considered a specialty merchant).

Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[BARKEEP] Who doesn't want to be a barkeep in an RPG? They get to tell all the latest rumors to would be travelers. You will get to name your barkeep, any name you want (within reason) it can be your Kickstarter handle or your real name, or whatever. \r\n\r\nReceive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[PET SHOP KEEPER] This is a weird one I know. In Barter Empire you can adopt pets. There is only one pet shop in the game, and you will name the pet shop keeper any name you wish, (within reason) it can be your Kickstarter handle, you real name, or anything at all. Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[BE FAMOUS] Your name in the ending credits! See your name in lights, a special thanks and shout out to you in the game! Be an NPC in the game! That's right, not only will we name it off you, but you can tell us what dialogue (within reason) you want your NPC to have! Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[THE FOUNDING FATHERS ~ SO SLUM CITY (THE CITY OF THIEVES)] You will get all previous rewards (except [THE ORPHAN MOTHER] [PET SHOP KEEPER] & [BARKEEP]) and be able to write a short blurb for a fountain plaque in the heart of So Slum City, about your history as the cities founding father (or mother). Maybe you fought a huge monster to claim the land. Or perhaps you're a merchant who settled here in search of wealth. Your name and story will be forever immortalized in he city square. You will have the option to choose between the hard copy of the game or the original soundtrack.

[THE FOUNDING FATHERS ~ BARTER CITY (THE CAPITAL CITY)] You will get all previous rewards (except [THE ORPHAN MOTHER] [PET SHOP KEEPER] & [BARKEEP]) and be able to write a short blurb for a fountain plaque in the heart of Barter City, about your history as the cities founding father (or mother). Maybe you fought a huge monster to claim the land. Or perhaps you're a merchant who settled here in search of wealth. Your name and story will be forever immortalized in he city square. You will have the option to choose between the hard copy of the game or the original soundtrack.

[THE FOUNDING FATHERS ~ NOCTURNE CITY (THE CITY OF VAMPIRES)] You will get all previous rewards (except [THE ORPHAN MOTHER] [PET SHOP KEEPER] & [BARKEEP]) and be able to write a short blurb for a fountain plaque in the heart of Nocturne City, about your history as the cities founding father (or mother). Maybe you fought a huge monster to claim the land. Or perhaps you're a merchant who settled here in search of wealth. Your name and story will be forever immortalized in he city square. You will have the option to choose between the hard copy of the game or the original soundtrack.

[THE FOUNDING FATHERS ~ BAAKAAR SANDS CITY (THE CITY IN THE SAND)] You will get all previous rewards (except [THE ORPHAN MOTHER] [PET SHOP KEEPER] & [BARKEEP]) and be able to write a short blurb for a fountain plaque in the heart of Baakaar Sands City, about your history as the cities founding father (or mother). Maybe you fought a huge monster to claim the land. Or perhaps you're a merchant who settled here in search of wealth. Your name and story will be forever immortalized in he city square.  You will have the option to choose between the hard copy of the game or the original soundtrack.

[OWN YOUR OWN TOWN] Have a town named after you! We will build a small town in the game and name it after you (within reason) i.e Jennifer Town! We will also name the mayor of your town after you and make a unique side quest just for you! Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. See your name in the opening credits! Receive an exclusive first look closed beta copy of the game before it becomes open beta!

[BECOME IMMORTAL] Gain immortality by seeing your name in the credits read A Game Produced by [INSERT YOUR NAME HERE]. You will also have exclusive ability to give input on the development of the game. Have a main storyline playable character created just for you in your likeness. You will submit a picture to us and we will use it to create your likeness. You will pick a name for your NPC.  Your NPC will be part of an exclusive main storyline quest! You will write the  dialogue and rewards for the quest! Have a town named after you! We will build a small town in the game and name it after you (within reason) i.e Jennifer Town! We will also name the mayor of your town after you and make a unique side quest just for you! You will name the barkeep and the shop keeper of the town. Receive a free digital copy of the game when it is released. Receive an autographed hard copy of the game. Receive a free Barter Empire Kickstarter exclusive limited edition T-Shirt, a Barter Empire autographed limited edition Kickstarter poster. Stickers, and a coffee mug. (BONUS) You will also get beta updated versions of the game as it is developed, so you can see how things are going, and give input into the games development. FREE shipping in the USA\r\n\r\n[THE ORPHAN MOTHER] There is only one orphan mother in Barter Empire, and it can be you! In this very limited reward, you will get to name the orphan mother at the So Slum City orphanage. There is only one orphanage in the entire game! You will pick a name for the orphan mother (within reason) It can be your Kickstarter handle, your real name, or just about anything.

[The Deity] Become a deity and not only do you get bragging rights, but you will also get everything from every other reward (except the [THE ORPHAN MOTHER] & [PET SHOP KEEPER]) as well as an Adam Mayhem autographed exclusive Barter Empire artwork. An autographed prototype (this was the first alpha version hard copy of the game ever made with flaws and all) hard copy of the game. An exclusive invitation to meet with Adam in Chicago for food, drinks, and entertainment in a one on one semi-release party style. Includes a 1 night stay in a downtown Chicago hotel (airfare not included).  You may also opt out of the invitation and just keep all the other rewards.
